text.en: May the sole source of happiness among beings,
text.en-trans: dro la dekyi jungwé go chikpu

text.en: The Omniscient Conqueror's precious teachings,
text.en-trans: künkhyen gyalwé tenpa rinpoche

text.en: Never decline in any place or at any time,
text.en-trans: yul dü nekab küntu mi nyampar

text.en: But flourish and spread to the farthest reaches of the world!
text.en-trans: chok tar dar zhing gyepar dzé du sol

text.en: May those who possess boundless wisdom and love,
text.en-trans: tsemé khyen dang tsewé pal nga zhing

text.en: Who cherish the Conqueror's teachings more dearly than life itself,
text.en-trans: gyalwé tenpa sok wé chedzin pé

text.en: The gurus and spiritual guides who are without equal,
text.en-trans: tsungmé lama gewé shenyen nam

text.en: Enjoy a long, extensive span of life!
text.en-trans: kutsé ring zhing gyepar dzé du sol

text.en: May those who reveal to beings the noble path of virtue,
text.en-trans: dro la gewé lamzang nang dzé ching

text.en: And who devote themselves to teaching and practice,
text.en-trans: ché dang drubpé jawa lhurlenpé

text.en: The saṅgha of Dharma practitioners, steadily endure,
text.en-trans: chö jé gendün dé dak zhabten ching

text.en: And may their activity extend in every direction!
text.en-trans: trinlé chok chur gyepar dzé du sol

text.en: May people be unafraid of sickness, ageing and death
text.en-trans: mi nam na ga chiwé jikme ching

text.en: And hold only correct views about the world,
text.en-trans: jikten yangdak tawa dang denpé

text.en: May their minds be full of loving kindness for one another,
text.en-trans: pentsün jampé yi dang den gyur ching

text.en: So that their joy expands and knows no bounds!
text.en-trans: tsemé gawa gyepar dzé du sol

text.en: May towns and cities everywhere be beautifully garlanded
text.en-trans: drong nam jampö lung gi yowa yi

text.en: With white prayer flags that flutter in the gentle breeze;
text.en-trans: baden karpö trengwé rab dzé shing

text.en: And may all their inhabitants be prosperous,
text.en-trans: gö zang rinchen gyen gyi trepa yi

text.en: Finely dressed and adorned with jewels.
text.en-trans: jorden kyewö gangwar dzé du sol

text.en: As clouds that flash with lightning embellish the sky,
text.en-trans: kha la lok treng gyuwé trin dzé shing

text.en: And peacocks brighten the earth with their joyous dance,
text.en-trans: sa la mabja gawé gar dzepa

text.en: May showers of gentle rain continuously descend
text.en-trans: zimbu dalgyi babpé char gyün gyi

text.en: To bring increasing delight to living beings!
text.en-trans: dro nam gawa gyepar dzé du sol

text.en: May mountains be adorned with meadows, flowers and streams,
text.en-trans: ri nam tsa dang metok babchü gyen

text.en: And valleys overflow with crops of grain and herds of livestock,
text.en-trans: lung nam natsok dru dang chuk kyi gang

text.en: May people sing out in perfect joy,
text.en-trans: mi nam rabtu gawé lulen ching

text.en: And all arrogance and quarrelling cease!
text.en-trans: drek dang tabtsö mepar dzé du sol

text.en: May kings and rulers govern peacefully and well,
text.en-trans: gyalpo chabsi zhiwé lek kyong zhing

text.en: As their subjects obey the laws with due respect;
text.en-trans: bang nam gyalpö kalung gü lenpé

text.en: Thus may outer and inner conflict be pacified
text.en-trans: chi dang nang gi truktsö nyerzhi né

text.en: And happiness reign just as in the golden age!
text.en-trans: dzokden zhindu dewar dzé du sol

text.en: May temples be adorned with the conquerors' images
text.en-trans: tsuklakhang nam gyalwé kuzuk dang

text.en: And filled with many volumes of the noble Dharma,
text.en-trans: damchö lekbam dumé rab dzé shing

text.en: While vast clouds of divine gifts beyond measure
text.en-trans: lhadzé chöpé trin tsok pakmé kyi

text.en: Cause great cascades of offerings to rain down!
text.en-trans: chöpé char chen gyepar dzé du sol

text.en: May all monasteries be filled with saffron-robed guides,
text.en-trans: gönné tamché tubten kyong jepé

text.en: Who safeguard the teachings of the great Sage;
text.en-trans: shenyen ngurmik dzinpé yong gang té

text.en: May they devote their time to teaching, debating and writing,
text.en-trans: ché tsö tsompé jawé dü da་zhing

text.en: So that scriptural study and recitation thrive!
text.en-trans: lok dang khatön gyepar dzé du sol

text.en: May lay practitioners, novices and fully ordained monks and nuns
text.en-trans: genyen getsul gelong pama nam

text.en: Possess ethical discipline that remains untainted;
text.en-trans: drima mepé tsultrim dangden zhing

text.en: And through pure study, contemplation and meditation,
text.en-trans: namdak tö sam gompé jawa yi

text.en: May the teachings of the sugatas spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: deshek tenpa gyepar dzé du sol

text.en: May practitioners abandon every form of distraction,
text.en-trans: drubpapo nam yengwa künpang té

text.en: Forsake all harm and stay far away from commotion;
text.en-trans: tsewa kündral dudzi rab wenpé

text.en: In places of tranquility, may they cultivate renunciation,
text.en-trans: zhiwé né su pongwa lhurlenpé

text.en: So that their qualities of realization develop and increase!
text.en-trans: tokpé yönten gyepar dzé du sol

text.en: May those who faithfully offer prayer in particular,
text.en-trans: lhakpar depé solwa deb jepa

text.en: We practitioners and all those around us,
text.en-trans: drubpo dakchak khor dangché nam la

text.en: Enjoy prosperity that is untainted by wrong livelihood,
text.en-trans: loktso dralwé paljor püntsok dang

text.en: And may our lifespan and mastery of the Dharma increase!
text.en-trans: tsé dang damchö gyepar dzé du sol

text.en: May we gain all the attributes of the buddhas,
text.en-trans: jin dang tsultrim zö dang tsöndrü dang

text.en: Including unsurpassable generosity, discipline,
text.en-trans: samten sherab lanamé sok kyi

text.en: Patience, diligence, concentration and wisdom,
text.en-trans: rang la sangye chö nam yongdzok né

text.en: And may our qualities of learning and realization grow!
text.en-trans: lungtok yönten gyepar dzé du sol

text.en: By attracting disciples with our generosity and pleasant speech,
text.en-trans: jin dang nyenpar mawé khor dü né

text.en: Through the purposeful act of teaching the Dharma correctly,
text.en-trans: dönchö damchö tsulzhin shepé tü

text.en: And through perfectly coordinating our own and others' aims,1
text.en-trans: rangzhen döntün chö la lek jar né

text.en: May benefit to others in accordance with the Dharma increase!
text.en-trans: zhendön chö zhin gyepar dzé du sol

text.en: May all that hinders and obstructs the Dharma be pacified
text.en-trans: chö kyi galkyen tadak nyerzhi zhing

text.en: And every form of favourable circumstance abound,
text.en-trans: tünkyen malü pün sum tsok gyur né

text.en: So that all these virtues, lauded by the Sage himself,
text.en-trans: gang dang gangla tubpé rab ngakpé

text.en: May prevail and flourish in each and every way!
text.en-trans: gewa didak gyepar dzé du sol
